00014 #ifndef BOOST_NEXT_PRIOR_HPP_INCLUDED
00015 #define BOOST_NEXT_PRIOR_HPP_INCLUDED
00016 
00017 #include <iterator>
00018 
00019 namespace boost {
00020 
00021 //  Helper functions for classes like bidirectional iterators not supporting
00022 //  operator+ and operator-
00023 //
00024 //  Usage:
00025 //    const std::list<T>::iterator p = get_some_iterator();
00026 //    const std::list<T>::iterator prev = boost::prior(p);
00027 //    const std::list<T>::iterator next = boost::next(prev, 2);
00028 
00029 //  Contributed by Dave Abrahams
00030 
00031 template <class T>
00032 inline T next(T x) { return ++x; }
00033 
00034 template <class T, class Distance>
00035 inline T next(T x, Distance n)
00036 {
00037     std::advance(x, n);
00038     return x;
00039 }
00040 
00041 template <class T>
00042 inline T prior(T x) { return --x; }
00043 
00044 template <class T, class Distance>
00045 inline T prior(T x, Distance n)
00046 {
00047     std::advance(x, -n);
00048     return x;
00049 }
00050 
00051 } // namespace boost
00052 
00053 #endif  // BOOST_NEXT_PRIOR_HPP_INCLUDED
